This Demo is an adaption of the Tanks mini game in Wii Play.

Move your tank (green) with W,S,A,D or the arrow keys. Target enemy tanks (red) with your mouse. Shoot with a left click to destroy enemy tanks. Bullets will bounce off walls. The object of each level is to defeat all enemy tanks. The abilities and the intelligence of enemy tanks vary.

This demo shows how constraints and object-oriented paradigms can interact using Babelsberg.
